name: Ube Sansrival
description: A decadent Filipino dessert made with layers of crunchy cashew, creamy buttercream, and infused with rich ube flavor.

name: Sylvanas Cookies
description: Crisp and buttery frozen cashew-meringue cookies filled with luscious buttercream, a classic Filipino treat.

name: Pistachio Sansrival
description: A luxurious layered cake made with pistachio, silky buttercream, and a nutty crunch in every bite.

name: Birthday Cake
description: Custom-made just as requested—pretty in pink and perfect for the birthday girl! 💕🎂

name: Birthday Cake
description: Happy 2nd Birthday, Romy! Celebrating with an amazing Ube Macapuno Ice Cream-themed Cake! 🎂🍦💜

name: Birthday Cake
description: Crafted a special birthday cake: sugar paste flowers, rich chocolate base, and smooth ganache and a custom cake topper by @createddyti. Thank you for your order! 🌸🌷

name: Birthday Cake
description: Minimalist on the outside, bursting with strawberry goodness on the inside! 🍓🎂

name: Wedding Cake
description: Love is the sweetest ingredient. ❤️🎂 Congratulations to the newlyweds! 🥂

name: Coffee Sansrival
description: Celebrate sweet moments with our Coffee Sans Rival!

name: Caramel Cake
description: Made with love for my brother’s birthday—his favorite caramel cake! Wishing you the sweetest day! 🎂💛

name: Christening Cake
description: Soft hues, rich flavors 💜 Minimalist Ube Macapuno Cake designed to celebrate life’s precious milestones.

name: Birthday Cake
description: Celebrating my favorite artist’s birthday with a special cake! His recent portrait paintings are printed on this buttercream and toffee crunch delight.
